name: Boundscape
description:
Trapped inside an alien world, two little creatures work together to escape.

Use the ability to lock in place to rescue the spawlings and escape the tunnels.

Controls

Left and right mouse button
or
Z and X
or
Left and right

Attribution

Music:
"Electronic bells and chords" by frankum licensed under CC BY 3.0
"Dark Pyramid Night Ambience Loop.wav" by szegvari licensed under CC0 1.0
"Fight Win Tune" by mrickey13 licensed under CC0 1.0

Sound effects were created using as3sfxr and jfxr.
